name: Alias Word
description: For One Instance of Keyword: Replace with Kindred Keyword

name: Grow One
description: Until End of Run: Max HP += 1

name: Focus One
description: Declare Condition. Next Blessing Draft will Include Condition

name: Alias Move
description: For One Move: Replace Each Instance of Keyword with Kindred Keyword

name: Grow Three
description: Until End of Run: Max HP += 3

name: Focus Two
description: Declare Condition. Until End of Run: Every Draft will Include Condition

name: Alias All
description: For Each Move: Replace Each Instance of a Keyword with Kindred Keyword

name: Grow Seven
description: Until End of Run: Max HP += 7

name: Focus Pocus
description: Until End of Run: All Blessings Are Rare

name: Break Bank
description: Once Per Blessing: You May Shuffle a Banked Move with no Rarity Limits; You may Rearrange After

name: Online Banker
description: After Receiving a Blessing: You May Rearrange your Banked/Active Move Pool

name: Iron Clad
description: Once Per Match: Reduce First Instance of Received Damage by 1

name: Lit Silly
description: Unlearn 1 Move: Receive 1 of 2 Random Rare Blessings; You May Rearrange Banked/Active Move Pool

name: Well Trimmed
description: Decrement Any One Integer Value on Any Move

name: Carnivore
description: Once Per Match: Heal Self equal to First Damage Self Deals

name: Pill Popper
description: Once Per Match: Start Match with 1 of 3 Random Statuses

name: Inspired
description: At Start of Match: Fill Any Empty Active Move Slot with a Random Move Opponent Has

name: Credit Unionizer
description: Banked Moves Boost Damage of their Element Affinity

name: Thick Skinned
description: Once Per Match: Ignore first Application of Stun or Anger

name: Midnight Stoker
description: Once Per Match: First to Gain Burn Gains 1 Sleep

name: Spruced Up
description: Increment Any One Integer Value on Any Move

name: Blood Brother
description: Wounds Deal Vital Damage to All Players When Ruptured

name: Persistant
description: Until End of Run: Your Status Effects Persist Between Matches

name: Plunder Struck
description: Until End of Run: Spend 1 Bank Slot; Start Rounds with +1 Iter

name: Deep Diver
description: Once Per Match: Spend a Turn to Rearrange your Banked/Active Move Pool

name: Genius Rocker
description: Until End of Run: You Can See Opponent's Private Attunements/Declarations

name: High Roller
description: Until End of Run: Attacks now use RNG: Misses/Criticals/Basic 2/2/2 Split

name: Green Thumbed
description: Until End of Run: On First Move Cast you may Alias 1 Keyword of your choice

name: Insatiable
description: Whenever Healing would Top Off at Max HP: Increase HP in Proportion to Excess

name: Born Again
description: For Each Active Move: You May Unlearn Move; If you do: Learn 1 of 2 Random Moves of Same Rarity

name: Time Traveller
description: Reset the Run; Retain Moves and Blessings; Lose either available Upgrade Option

name: Moist Maker
description: At Match Start: Target Becomes Attuned to Water

name: Grounded
description: Self is Immune to Stun

name: Heat Seeker
description: When Self Becomes Attuned to Fire: Set Wager Count to 5

name: Photosynthetic
description: Whenever Player Attunes to Fire or Lightning: Regen += 1

name: Bone Head
description: Non-Vital Attunements Self-Negate after 3 Turns

name: Less Winded
description: Self Cooldowns start with 1 less Count

name: Keeps Current
description: If Self would Lose Attunement to Thunder: Reattune after Losing Attune.

name: Black Washed
description: Water Attacks Negate All Statuses and then Apply 1 Curse

name: Resourceful
description: Whenever Attunement is Negated: You May Attune to Negated Element

name: Galvanized
description: At Turn Start: If Not Strong: Gain 1 Strong

name: Grass Toucher
description: When Deals Damage to Non-Plant Attuned: Target Becomes Attuned to Plant

name: Single Minded
description: If Not Attuned to Non-Vital: Attacks Deal +2 Damage

name: Rust Built
description: Whenever self attunes to water: Negate Water Attune; Gain 1 Strong

name: Quick Witted
description: All Actions are Quick Actions

name: Dripped Out
description: While Self Attuned to > 3 Elements Immune to Non-Water Damage

name: Stone Butcher
description: When Attacking with Stone Attack: Swap Iter and Pre-Calc Damage Values

name: Multilingual
description: When Making Declaration: Make Two Declarations; Both Apply

name: Vine Dancer
description: Whenever Bind You Make Terminate: Declare Non-Public Move: Bind Declared Move

name: Gut Buster
description: Vital Attacks Rupture Wounds

name: Second Winded
description: If You Die: Heal HP to Max HP Lose all Attunements + Statuses (Once per Run)

name: Shockingly Fair
description: Your Attacks Hit Everyone; Iter += 1

name: Gyromaniac
description: While Burn: If Opponent Heals: Heal Proportional to Opponent Heal

name: Dead Head
description: While Wound: If would Die from Wound Damage: Set HP to 1; Sleep += 1

name: Mold Souled
description: While Decay: If would gain Decay: Gain Regen Proportunately

name: Peet Pilled
description: While Regen: If would gain Non-Regen Status: Gain 1 Regen Also

name: Speed Freak
description: While Quick: Iter += 1; Lose all Quick End of Execution

name: Heavy Pockets
description: While Slow: May use Moves from your Bank in Combat

name: Heavy Sleeper
description: While Sleep: Immune to Non-Status Damage

name: Under Pressure
description: While Angry: Immune to Sleep and Stun

name: Show Stopper
description: While Stun: All Public Information about you is Disguised (Math is Public but non-descriptive)

name: Plain Unlucky
description: While Curse: Immune to Status Effects other than Curse

name: Fire Starter
description: While Burn: Before Move Execution: Opponents Gain 1 Burn

name: Marrow Minded
description: While Wound: Attacks Deal 1 More Wound

name: Spoiled Rotten
description: While Decay: Ignore Cooldowns

name: Tree Hugger
description: While Regen: If Targeted by Plant Move: Bind Move

name: Eye Spry
description: While Quick: Before Declarations you may see Opponents Move Choice

name: Slow Learner
description: While Slow: When Opponent Uses Move: May Unlearn Move and Learn this Move until End of Match

name: Dreamer
description: While Sleep: May Use Banked Moves in Combat as if they were SleepProof

name: Ungovernable
description: While Angry: Ignore Bound; Ignore Sleep
